task.title: Deleting a security profile by using the command line
task.shortdesc: System administrators can delete security profiles by using the delete SecurityProfile command on the command line.

context.p: You can delete a security profile by using the command line, or by using the . For more information about using the to delete a security profile, see .

step.cmd: To delete a security profile, enter the following command:
step.info:
delete SecurityProfile "Name=name"Where:
name Specifies the name of the security profile you want to delete.
